pthread_mutex_t Struct Reference
[Pthread]

A structure representing a thread mutex. More...

Data Fields

  • int spinlock
  • int mutex_type
  • uint32_t owner_thread_id
  • uint32_t recursion_counter
  • int mutex_handle

Detailed Description

A structure representing a thread mutex.

It should be considered an opaque record; the names of the fields can change anytime.

Field Documentation

int pthread_mutex_t::mutex_handle

Handle to the system-side mutex.

int pthread_mutex_t::mutex_type

The kind of mutex: PTHREAD_MUTEX_FAST_NP, PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE_NP, or PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK_NP.

uint32_t pthread_mutex_t::owner_thread_id

ID of the thread that owns the mutex.

uint32_t pthread_mutex_t::recursion_counter

Recursion depth counter for recursive mutexes.

int pthread_mutex_t::spinlock

Initialization spinlock.
